oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from John Coffee to his wife, Mary Coffee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A two page letter dated April 1, 1814 and sent from Fort Williams in Alabama. Coffee describes a victorious battle fought against the Creek Indians at the bend of the "Tallepoosey" [Tallapoosa] River. He hopes to see an end to the Creek War within 10 days time.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Dyas Collection of John Coffee Papers
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Coffee, John, 1772-1833;Creek War, 1813-1814;Horseshoe Bend, Battle of, Ala., 1814
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Coffee, John, 1772-1833
